info.title: App Compliance Automation Tool for Microsoft 365
info.description: App Compliance Automation Tool for Microsoft 365 API spec

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations of the Microsoft.AppComplianceAutomation provider.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of operations.

post.description: Onboard given subscriptions to Microsoft.AppComplianceAutomation provider.

200.description: Success. The response indicates given subscriptions has been onboarded.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the onboard operation is performed in the background.

post.description: Trigger evaluation for given resourceIds to get quick compliance result.

200.description: Success. The response indicates given resource ids' evaluation has been triggered.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the trigger evaluation operation is performed in the background.

get.description: Get the AppComplianceAutomation report list for the tenant.
Get the AppComplianceAutomation report and its properties.

put.description: Create a new AppComplianceAutomation report or update an exiting AppComplianceAutomation report.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes a AppComplianceAutomation report.

201.description: Created. The response describes the new service and contains a Location header to query the operation result.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes a AppComplianceAutomation report.
Success. The response indicates the resource has been deleted.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the delete operation is performed in the background.

204.description: Success. The response indicates the resource is already deleted.

get.description: Get the AppComplianceAutomation webhook and its properties.

put.description: Create a new AppComplianceAutomation webhook or update an exiting AppComplianceAutomation webhook.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes a AppComplianceAutomation webhook.

201.description: Created. The response describes a AppComplianceAutomation webhook.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes a AppComplianceAutomation webhook.
Success. The response indicates the resource has been deleted.

204.description: Success. The response indicates the resource is already deleted.

get.description: Get the AppComplianceAutomation snapshot and its properties.

post.description: Download compliance needs from snapshot, like: Compliance Report, Resource List.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the exiting AppComplianceAutomation report is now updating and contains a Location header to query the operation result.

OverviewStatus.description: The overview of the compliance result for one report.

passedCount.description: The count of all passed full automation control.

failedCount.description: The count of all failed full automation control.

manualCount.description: The count of all manual control.

ReportComplianceStatus.description: A list which includes all the compliance result for one report.

timeZone.description:
Report collection trigger time's time zone, the available list can be obtained by executing "Get-TimeZone -ListAvailable" in PowerShell.
An example of valid timezone id is "Pacific Standard Time".

ReportResource.description: A class represent an AppComplianceAutomation report resource.

sendAllEvents.description: whether to send notification under any event.

events.description: under which event notification should be sent.

webhookKey.description: webhook secret token. If not set, this field value is null; otherwise, please set a string value.

WebhookResource.description: A class represent an AppComplianceAutomation webhook resource.

ReportResourcePatch.description: A class represent a AppComplianceAutomation report resource update properties.

WebhookResourcePatch.description: A class represent a AppComplianceAutomation webhook resource update properties.

ResponsibilityEnvironment.description: Indicates the customer responsibility supported cloud environment.

recommendationShortName.description: The short name of the recommendation. e.g. "Invalid TLS config"

RecommendationSolution.description: A class represent the recommendation solution.

recommendationSolutionIndex.description: The index of the recommendation solution.

recommendationSolutionContent.description: The detail steps of the recommendation solution.

isRecommendSolution.description: Indicates whether this solution is the recommended.

resourceType.description: The type of the resource. e.g. "Microsoft.SignalRService/SignalR"

resourceStatusChangeDate.description: The status change date for the resource.

Responsibility.description: A class represent the customer responsibility.

responsibilityId.description: The id of the customer responsibility.

responsibilityTitle.description: The title of the customer responsibility.

responsibilityDescription.description: The description of the customer responsibility.

responsibilitySeverity.description: The severity level of this customer responsibility.

responsibilityStatus.description: The status of this customer responsibility.

responsibilityEnvironment.description: The supported cloud environment of this customer responsibility.

failedResourceCount.description: The count of all failed resources.

justification.description: The justification given by the user to clarify the reason.

controlId.description: The Id of the control. e.g. "Operational Security#10"

controlName.description: The name of the control. e.g. "Unsupported OS and Software."

controlFullName.description: The full name of the control. e.g. "Validate that unsupported operating systems and software components are not in use."

controlDescriptionHyperLink.description: The hyper link to the control's description'.

ControlFamily.description: A class represent the control family.

controlFamilyName.description: The name of the control family. e.g. "Malware Protection - Anti-Virus"

Category.description: A class represent the compliance category.

categoryName.description: The name of the compliance category. e.g. "Operational Security"

ComplianceResult.description: A class represent the compliance result.

complianceName.description: The name of the compliance. e.g. "M365"

offerGuid.description: The offerGuid which mapping to the reports.

subscriptionIds.description: List of subscription ids to be onboarded
List of subscription ids that are onboarded

resourceIds.description: List of resource ids to be evaluated

triggerTime.description: The time when the evaluation is triggered.

evaluationEndTime.description: The time when the evaluation is end.

resourceIds.description: List of resource ids to be evaluated

QuickAssessment.description: A class represent the quick assessment.

remediationLink.description: Link to remediation steps for this quick assessment.

SnapshotResource.description: A class represent a AppComplianceAutomation snapshot resource.

ReportResourceList.description: Object that includes an array of resources and a possible link for next set.

nextLink.description:
The URL the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

WebhookResourceList.description: Object that includes an array of resources and a possible link for next set.

nextLink.description:
The URL the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

SnapshotResourceList.description: Object that includes an array of resources and a possible link for next set.

nextLink.description:
The URL the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription Id of this resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group name of this resource.

resourceType.description: The resource type of this resource. e.g. "Microsoft.SignalRService/SignalR"

DownloadResponse.description: Object that includes all the possible response for the download operation.

sasUri.description: The uri of compliance pdf report
The uri of detailed compliance pdf report

ComplianceReportItem.description: Object that includes all the content for single compliance result.

responsibilityTitle.description: The title of the customer responsibility.

responsibilityDescription.description: The description of the customer responsibility.

resourceType.description: The type of the resource.  e.g. "Microsoft.SignalRService/SignalR"

resourceStatusChangeDate.description: The status change date for the resource.

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: Number of elements to return when retrieving results.

OfferGuidParameter.name: offerGuid
OfferGuidParameter.description: The offerGuid which mapping to the reports.

ReportCreatorTenantIdParameter.name: reportCreatorTenantId
ReportCreatorTenantIdParameter.description: The tenant id of the report creator.

SelectParameter.name: $select
SelectParameter.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. ?$select=reportName,id.
